alert.note: Alert for Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued May 15 at 4:16PM EDT until May 16 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield County. In New York, Southern Westchester County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 2 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Similar conditions are likely to occur again with the high tide Monday evening. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. STAMFORD HARBOR AT STAMFORD CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 9.4 FT, MODERATE 11.0 FT, MAJOR 12.4 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.6 FT, MODERATE 3.2 FT, MAJOR 4.6 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/11 AM 8.2/ 8.7 0.4/ 0.9 0.2/ 0.8 1 NONE 16/12 AM 9.4/ 9.9 1.6/ 2.0 0.2/ 0.8 1 MINOR 16/12 PM 8.4/ 8.9 0.6/ 1.1 0.4/ 0.9 1 NONE 17/12 AM 9.4/ 9.9 1.6/ 2.0 0.2/ 0.7 1-3 MINOR 17/01 PM 8.1/ 8.6 0.2/ 0.8 0.1/ 0.6 2 NONE 18/01 AM 9.1/ 9.6 1.3/ 1.8 -0.2/ 0.3 1 NONE BRIDGEPORT HARBOR AT BRIDGEPORT CT MLLW CATEGORIES -
